bibl.title: Women and the Law in the Roman Empire. A sourcebook on marriage, divorce and widowhood (nur Auszüge)
bibl.note: Voir en part. pp. 122-135: Marriage contracts from Egypt and the Near East; - 210-218: Divorce in Egypt and the Near East.
GRUBBS Judith Evans, Women and the Law in the Roman Empire. A Sourcebook on Marriage, Divorce and Widowhood.
London - New York, Routledge, 2002, 8°, xxiv-349 pp. ISBN 0-415-15240-2 (hbk) / 0-415-15241-0 (pbk). £55 (hbk) / 17.99 (pbk).
